attributes.action: Update the Sex Discrimination Act 1975 to include the display of sexist publications in retail outlets
attributes.additional_details: That all publications such as lads magazines, clothing or newspapers that advertise advertisements or pictures deemed to be sexist under the SDA 1975 or in nature, be either taken off the shelves or wrapped in modesty wraps. This is to ensure that women working in retail do not feel discriminated against.
